title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - March 15, 2022
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - March 15, 2022
description:
Adam and Mark link up in studio to discuss a recent filing by Alec Baldwin's legal team, Jussie Smolett's verdict and possible next steps as well as an update on Colin Kaepernick.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
